name: JoyCon Simulator 2
description:
This is our PC port of Android game. We've removed ads from this version so you can enjoy PC vesrion without any distracting things. If you wan't to support us, take the game "with you" and download the game from Google Play Store :)



JoyCon Simulator 2 is the next part of popular Android arcade game!

Rotate the gamepads to connect them to the console! But hurry, time is limited! Beat new records and earn COINS! 

3D GRAPHICS!

JoyCon Simulator is now 3D! Enjoy the new experience!

NO-TIME MODE!

No-Time mode will allow YOU to get BETTER and practice! We know you asked for it!

SKINS!

Spend COINS on skins in the STORE! Get SKINS for Common to LEGENDARY PACKS! GET YOUR COLLECTION!

COMBO SYSTEM!

Get better with the new combo system! More combos - more rewards! BE THE BEST!
